about.title: What is Blueprint?
about.description: Blueprint is a Create Mod resource site to find addons, schematics, and more!

forCreator.title: For Creators
forCreator.description: We're here to help showcase your addons to the Blueprint community

card.title: Can't find your addon?
card.description: Let us know and we'll help get your addon listed
card.content: Our addon scanning process is fully automated. Contact us to request a rescan and get your addon included in our directory.

usefulLinks.title: Useful Links
usefulLinks.description: Essential resources for Create mod developers and users

about.subTitle: Our Mission
about.content1: Blueprint emerged from recognizing the need for a centralized platform that serves the Create Mod community effectively. We built this site using modern web technologies to provide a robust solution for discovering and sharing content.
about.content2: Our goal is to consolidate Create Mod resources in one accessible location - connecting addon developers with users and enabling easy sharing of contraption designs. We aim to enhance discoverability and foster collaboration within the community.

card1.title: Discover Addons
card1.description: Browse and manage the growing ecosystem of Create Mod extensions.

card2.title: Share Creations
card2.description: Upload and showcase your automated contraptions and engineering designs.

card3.title: Join Our Community
card3.description: Connect with fellow Create enthusiasts and contribute to the ecosystem.

card1.title: Discord
card1.description: For updates, sneak peeks, and issue reporting.

subtitle.main: Thanks to our awesome contributors. Without you this wouldn't have been possible ❤️
subtitle.api: Also a big thanks to those who helped us building the API ❤️

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of your app

auth.title: Manage authentication providers
auth.description: Add or remove sign-on methods from your account, including GitHub, GitLab, Microsoft, Discord, Steam, and Google.

sessions.title: Manage Sessions
sessions.description: See your session trough all your device !
sessions.name: Name

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose between light and dark mode for the site interface.

easter-eggs.title: Easter Eggs
easter-eggs.description: Discover and toggle special features hidden throughout the application.
easter-eggs.keep-exploring: Keep exploring to discover more easter eggs!

public-profile.title: Profile informations
public-profile.description: Your profile information is publicly viewable on Blueprint and through the Blueprint API.

username.title: Username
username.description: A unique case-insensitive name to identify your profile.

bio.title: Bio
bio.description: A short description to tell everyone a little bit about you.

legacyLogo.name: Legacy Logo
legacyLogo.description: Replaces the current Blueprint logo with the classic legacy logo.
legacyLogo.hint: Try clicking on things that represent our identity.

page-not-found.title: Page Not Found
page-not-found.description1: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
page-not-found.description2: If you believe this is a bug email us at
